attributes.action: Commit to not remove LGBT content from the Relationships Education curriculum.
attributes.additional_details: Recent studies have shown that 10.5% of millennials, and a further 20%+ of Gen Z and lower identify as part of the LGBT umbrella. This goes to show that LGBT relationships are an important part of everyday society and removing this critical information from the Relationships Curriculum will have adverse affects on the development of a child; leading to confusion and mixed emotions.
attributes.background: The government should commit to not remove important LGBT-related content from the Relationships Education curriculum.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631529
